name: You Are The Aliens
description:
LibGDX Game Jam Entry!

Experience space through the eyes of the aliens! You Are The Aliens is a real time strategy game in the vein of Majesty. You have indirect control of the alien forces, and must guide them by placing flags on the map.

Currently in development. Later releases will allow you to play as any of the four factions.

CONTROLS:

If mouse wheel zooming in and out does not work, use a browser other than Safari. Sorry!

Press P to pause

Press M to open the game menu

Press K to view the player skills
